title: Charles by the grace of God, King of Great Britaine ... forsomuch as in our Parliament holden at Edinburgh upon the twentie eighth day of June, 1633 ... have made one voluntarie and free offer of one taxation ... thirtie shillings ...
author: Scotland. Sovereign (1625-1649 : Charles I)
notes: Second pt. of title from text.
"Given under our signet at Edinburgh the twentie eight day of June, and of our reigne the ninth year, 1633."
Reproduction of original in the Town House (Aberdeen, Scotland). Charter Room.
